name: The Infernal Frisbee Strikes Back
description:
/!\  Game contains a lot of shakes and flashing screens /! \

----------

Made in a week-end during Global Game Jam in January 2016.

The theme was "Ritual" and we picked the diversifiers "No retreat, no surrender !" and "One hand tied behind my back"

The original idea came from its title, that was generated randomly from the Internet.

----------

Henri : Code

Dodo : Art

Coco : Art

Chouqi : Music

----------

KILL THE GOAT

Click to slash the slimes, avoid everything else

The goat's life is represented by the candles

Your energy meter is at the bottom of the screen. Kill enough slimes to morph !

In frisbee form, you can let go of the mouse until you morph back

----------

JUST CLICK IT

Magic Frisbee Girl always walks towards your pointer

LCLICK : Dash
